<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Archaeologist's Warning](/Feats.aspx?ID=2225) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 40</row>

**Archetype** [Pathfinder Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=13)

**Prerequisites**
[Pathfinder Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=871)

**Trigger**
You are about to roll a Perception, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14), or [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) check for initiative.

</column>

---

You visually or audibly warn your companions of danger, granting them a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls. Depending on whether you use gestures or call out, this free action gains either the [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) or [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) trait.
name: Archaeologist's Warning
